Index: 
===================================================================
---

     <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
 
-    <groupId>com.client</groupId>
+    <groupId>com.myclient</groupId> <!-- Sesuaikan dengan package baru -->
     <artifactId>mybomber</artifactId>
     <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
 
     <properties>
         <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
         <maven.compiler.release>17</maven.compiler.release>
         <javafx.version>21.0.2</javafx.version>
-        <javafx.os>win</javafx.os>
+        <javafx.os>win</javafx.os> <!-- Pastikan ini win jika build di Windows -->
     </properties>
 
     <dependencies>
-
         <!-- JavaFX Controls -->
         <dependency>
             <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
             <artifactId>javafx-controls</artifactId>
@@ -31,44 +30,33 @@
             <artifactId>javafx-graphics</artifactId>
             <version>${javafx.version}</version>
         </dependency>
 
-        <!-- JavaFX FXML (kalau perlu) -->
+        <!-- JavaFX FXML -->
         <dependency>
             <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
             <artifactId>javafx-fxml</artifactId>
             <version>${javafx.version}</version>
         </dependency>
 
-        <!-- Gson -->
+        <!-- JavaFX Media (Untuk Suara) -->
         <dependency>
-            <groupId>com.google.code.gson</groupId>
-            <artifactId>gson</artifactId>
-            <version>2.10.1</version>
-        </dependency>
-
-        <dependency>
             <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
             <artifactId>javafx-media</artifactId>
-            <version>21.0.2</version>
+            <version>${javafx.version}</version>
             <classifier>${javafx.os}</classifier>
         </dependency>
 
+        <!-- Gson (JSON Parsing) -->
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>com.google.code.gson</groupId>
+            <artifactId>gson</artifactId>
+            <version>2.10.1</version>
+        </dependency>
     </dependencies>
 
     <build>
         <plugins>
-
-            <!-- JavaFX Run -->
-            <plugin>
-                <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
-                <artifactId>javafx-maven-plugin</artifactId>
-                <version>0.0.8</version>
-                <configuration>
-                    <mainClass>com.client/com.client.App</mainClass>
-                </configuration>
-            </plugin>
-
             <!-- Compiler -->
             <plugin>
                 <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                 <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
@@ -77,8 +65,78 @@
                     <release>17</release>
                 </configuration>
             </plugin>
 
+            <!-- JavaFX Plugin (KONFIGURASI PENTING UTK EXE) -->
+            <plugin>
+                <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
+                <artifactId>javafx-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+                <version>0.0.8</version>
+                <configuration>
+                    <!-- Pastikan ini sesuai dengan package dan class App kamu -->
+                    <mainClass>com.myclient.App</mainClass>
+                    
+                    <!-- Nama folder output image -->
+                    <jlinkImageName>bomber-runtime</jlinkImageName>
+                    
+                    <!-- Nama Launcher (file .bat sementara) -->
+                    <launcher>BomberLauncher</launcher>
+                    
+                    <!-- Optimasi ukuran file -->
+                    <stripDebug>true</stripDebug>
+                    <compress>2</compress>
+                    <noHeaderFiles>true</noHeaderFiles>
+                    <noManPages>true</noManPages>
+                </configuration>
+            </plugin>
         </plugins>
     </build>
+</project>
+```
 
-</project>
+---
+
+### Langkah Selanjutnya (PENTING)
+
+Sebelum menjalankan perintah build, pastikan file **`module-info.java`** kamu sudah benar karena `jpackage` sangat bergantung padanya.
+
+Cek file `src/main/java/module-info.java`, isinya harus kurang lebih seperti ini (sesuaikan jika ada yang kurang):
+
+```java
+module com.myclient {
+    requires javafx.controls;
+    requires javafx.fxml;
+    requires javafx.media;     // Wajib buat suara
+    requires com.google.gson;  // Wajib buat GSON
+    
+    // Izinkan akses ke package utama
+    opens com.myclient to javafx.fxml;
+    exports com.myclient;
+    
+    // Izinkan akses ke controller UI (jika ada)
+    exports com.myclient.ui;
+}
+```
+
+---
+
+### CARA BUILD EXE (Final Step)
+
+Buka Terminal (PowerShell) di folder project kamu, lalu jalankan perintah ini satu per satu:
+
+**1. Bersihkan dan Buat Runtime Image:**
+```powershell
+mvn clean javafx:jlink
+```
+*(Tunggu sampai "BUILD SUCCESS". Ini akan membuat folder `target/bomber-runtime`)*
+
+**2. Bungkus jadi EXE:**
+Jalankan perintah panjang ini (copy-paste semua baris):
+
+```powershell
+jpackage --name "BomberGame" `
+  --type app-image `
+  --runtime-image "target/bomber-runtime" `
+  --module "com.myclient/com.myclient.App" `
+  --dest "game_output" `
+  --win-shortcut `
+  --win-menu
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,142 @@
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 
+                             http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <groupId>com.myclient</groupId> <!-- Sesuaikan dengan package baru -->
+    <artifactId>mybomber</artifactId>
+    <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+
+    <properties>
+        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
+        <maven.compiler.release>17</maven.compiler.release>
+        <javafx.version>21.0.2</javafx.version>
+        <javafx.os>win</javafx.os> <!-- Pastikan ini win jika build di Windows -->
+    </properties>
+
+    <dependencies>
+        <!-- JavaFX Controls -->
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
+            <artifactId>javafx-controls</artifactId>
+            <version>${javafx.version}</version>
+        </dependency>
+
+        <!-- JavaFX Graphics -->
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
+            <artifactId>javafx-graphics</artifactId>
+            <version>${javafx.version}</version>
+        </dependency>
+
+        <!-- JavaFX FXML -->
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
+            <artifactId>javafx-fxml</artifactId>
+            <version>${javafx.version}</version>
+        </dependency>
+
+        <!-- JavaFX Media (Untuk Suara) -->
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
+            <artifactId>javafx-media</artifactId>
+            <version>${javafx.version}</version>
+            <classifier>${javafx.os}</classifier>
+        </dependency>
+
+        <!-- Gson (JSON Parsing) -->
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>com.google.code.gson</groupId>
+            <artifactId>gson</artifactId>
+            <version>2.10.1</version>
+        </dependency>
+    </dependencies>
+
+    <build>
+        <plugins>
+            <!-- Compiler -->
+            <plugin>
+                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
+                <version>3.11.0</version>
+                <configuration>
+                    <release>17</release>
+                </configuration>
+            </plugin>
+
+            <!-- JavaFX Plugin (KONFIGURASI PENTING UTK EXE) -->
+            <plugin>
+                <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
+                <artifactId>javafx-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+                <version>0.0.8</version>
+                <configuration>
+                    <!-- Pastikan ini sesuai dengan package dan class App kamu -->
+                    <mainClass>com.myclient.App</mainClass>
+                    
+                    <!-- Nama folder output image -->
+                    <jlinkImageName>bomber-runtime</jlinkImageName>
+                    
+                    <!-- Nama Launcher (file .bat sementara) -->
+                    <launcher>BomberLauncher</launcher>
+                    
+                    <!-- Optimasi ukuran file -->
+                    <stripDebug>true</stripDebug>
+                    <compress>2</compress>
+                    <noHeaderFiles>true</noHeaderFiles>
+                    <noManPages>true</noManPages>
+                </configuration>
+            </plugin>
+        </plugins>
+    </build>
+</project>
+```
+
+---
+
+### Langkah Selanjutnya (PENTING)
+
+Sebelum menjalankan perintah build, pastikan file **`module-info.java`** kamu sudah benar karena `jpackage` sangat bergantung padanya.
+
+Cek file `src/main/java/module-info.java`, isinya harus kurang lebih seperti ini (sesuaikan jika ada yang kurang):
+
+```java
+module com.myclient {
+    requires javafx.controls;
+    requires javafx.fxml;
+    requires javafx.media;     // Wajib buat suara
+    requires com.google.gson;  // Wajib buat GSON
+    
+    // Izinkan akses ke package utama
+    opens com.myclient to javafx.fxml;
+    exports com.myclient;
+    
+    // Izinkan akses ke controller UI (jika ada)
+    exports com.myclient.ui;
+}
+```
+
+---
+
+### CARA BUILD EXE (Final Step)
+
+Buka Terminal (PowerShell) di folder project kamu, lalu jalankan perintah ini satu per satu:
+
+**1. Bersihkan dan Buat Runtime Image:**
+```powershell
+mvn clean javafx:jlink
+```
+*(Tunggu sampai "BUILD SUCCESS". Ini akan membuat folder `target/bomber-runtime`)*
+
+**2. Bungkus jadi EXE:**
+Jalankan perintah panjang ini (copy-paste semua baris):
+
+```powershell
+jpackage --name "BomberGame" `
+  --type app-image `
+  --runtime-image "target/bomber-runtime" `
+  --module "com.myclient/com.myclient.App" `
+  --dest "game_output" `
+  --win-shortcut `
+  --win-menu
\ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 
                             http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">

    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>com.client</groupId>
    <artifactId>mybomber</artifactId>
    <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <maven.compiler.release>17</maven.compiler.release>
        <javafx.version>21.0.2</javafx.version>
        <javafx.os>win</javafx.os>
    </properties>

    <dependencies>

        <!-- JavaFX Controls -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
            <artifactId>javafx-controls</artifactId>
            <version>${javafx.version}</version>
        </dependency>

        <!-- JavaFX Graphics -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
            <artifactId>javafx-graphics</artifactId>
            <version>${javafx.version}</version>
        </dependency>

        <!-- JavaFX FXML (kalau perlu) -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
            <artifactId>javafx-fxml</artifactId>
            <version>${javafx.version}</version>
        </dependency>

        <!-- Gson -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.code.gson</groupId>
            <artifactId>gson</artifactId>
            <version>2.10.1</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
            <artifactId>javafx-media</artifactId>
            <version>21.0.2</version>
            <classifier>${javafx.os}</classifier>
        </dependency>

    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <plugins>

            <!-- JavaFX Run -->
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.openjfx</groupId>
                <artifactId>javafx-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>0.0.8</version>
                <configuration>
                    <mainClass>com.client/com.client.App</mainClass>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <!-- Compiler -->
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.11.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <release>17</release>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

        </plugins>
    </build>

</project>
